resources.string: WALLit 1.0.1.043025B. © 2025 GearTurner Apps (MD Fayed bin Salim and Hunter Pageau). All rights reserved.

WALLit is the wallpaper hub.

Browse from over 1,000 exciting wallpapers from Picsum's library. Tap a wallpaper to see additional information, add it to your favorites, save it to your photos, or share it with friends.

All wallpapers were sourced from https://picsum.photos/. Check them out!

To report a bug or suggest features, contact us at gearturnerdev@gmail.com.

Thank you for using WALLit! ❤️
